item.title: 能源交易商摩科瑞第三年盈利超过 20 亿美元
item.description: 摩科瑞能源集团有限公司（Mercuria Energy Group Ltd）去年的利润略高于 20 亿美元，这是在大宗商品盈利热潮开始消退之际，这家能源交易商取得的又一丰硕成果。【原文：Mercuria Energy Group Ltd made profits of just over $2 billion last year, another bumper result for the energy trader even as a boom in commodities earnings began to fade.】

item.title: 特鲁多与加拿大总理就利用资源作为贸易武器发生争执
item.description: 加拿大总理贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）和加拿大各省省长正在进行高风险会谈，商讨如果美国发动地区贸易战，该如何利用石油和其他大宗商品作为武器。【原文：Prime Minister Justin Trudeau and the premiers of Canada’s provinces are in high-stakes talks over how far to go in using oil and other commodities as a weapon if the US starts a regional trade war.】

item.title: 米莱伊政府被指控歪曲大豆河升级改造的拍卖结果
item.description: 阿根廷每年向全球市场运送价值数百亿美元的农作物，为升级改造这条主要水道而进行的招标工作期待已久，但却遭到了猛烈抨击，其中有两家投标方指责阿根廷政府偏袒目前的承包商。【原文：A long-awaited tender to upgrade a major waterway that ships crops worth tens of billions of dollars a year to global markets is coming under fierce criticism, including from two suitors that accuse Argentina’s government of favoring the current contractor.】

item.title: 美联储古尔斯比称通胀改善，有望实现软着陆
item.description: 芝加哥联邦储备银行行长古尔斯比（Austan Goolsbee）表示，他看到通胀持续改善，并对央行能够在不引发经济衰退的情况下抑制物价增长表示乐观。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Chicago President Austan Goolsbee said he sees continued improvement in inflation and is optimistic the central bank can tame price growth without sparking an economic downturn.】

item.title: 据说安宏资本将任命 D'Angelo 领导欧洲医疗保健交易
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，收购公司 Advent 已任命 Sergio D'Angelo 负责欧洲的医疗保健交易。【原文：Buyout firm Advent has named Sergio D’Angelo to lead health-care dealmaking in Europe, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会的黑客披露规则被共和党人盯上了
item.description:
四天的通知截止日期是争论的焦点。【原文：

A four-day notification deadline is the subject of contention.

】

item.title: Kering 向 Ardian 出售巴黎三处地产的多数股权
item.description: 开云集团（Kering SA）将向法国私募股权公司 Ardian 出售巴黎三处房产的大部分股权，这笔交易将为陷入困境的古驰（Gucci）时装品牌所有者带来 8.37 亿欧元（约合 8.61 亿美元）的收益。【原文：Kering SA will sell a majority stake in three Paris properties to French private equity firm Ardian, a deal that will net the struggling owner of the Gucci fashion label €837 million ($861 million).】

item.title: 英国央行行长泰勒呼吁削减开支以防英国经济硬着陆
item.description: 英格兰银行利率制定者艾伦-泰勒（Alan Taylor）呼吁先发制人地降息，以防止英国经济硬着陆，同时他警告说，如果官员们行动过于迟缓，英国经济将面临衰退风险。【原文：Bank of England rate-setter Alan Taylor called for pre-emptive interest-rate cuts to prevent a hard landing for the UK economy, as he warned of a recession risk if officials act too slowly.】

item.title: 美国的通胀与否
item.description: 12 月份的基本价格压力有所缓解，但对美国家庭最为重要的价格类别仍显示出强劲的年度通胀率。【原文：Underlying price pressures eased in December, but categories that matter most to US households are still showing stiff inflation rates on an annual basis.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利提拔马赫达维和蒂斯代尔负责美洲地区并购业务
item.description: 据一位熟悉情况的人士透露，摩根士丹利已提拔 Lily Mahdavi 和 Ben Teasdale 共同领导其美洲地区的并购团队。【原文：Morgan Stanley has promoted Lily Mahdavi and Ben Teasdale to co-lead its mergers and acquisitions team in the Americas, according to a person familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 拜登时代终结，摩根大通、高盛和花旗创下历史记录
item.description: 尽管华尔街对唐纳德-特朗普的经济增长计划感到兴奋，但最大的银行却在拜登时代结束时大放异彩。【原文：For all of Wall Street’s excitement about Donald Trump’s growth agenda, the biggest banks are ending the Biden years on a high note.】

item.title: 美联储威廉姆斯表示相信通胀将进一步放缓
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行行长约翰-威廉姆斯（John Williams）在一份消费者物价报告好于预期后表示，相信通胀将继续消退，但并未就进一步降息的时机给出任何暗示。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of New York President John Williams voiced confidence that inflation would continue to recede after a report on consumer prices came in better than expected, without offering any hints on the timing of additional interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 美联储主席巴金称 CPI 数据显示通胀率向 2% 目标迈进
item.description: 里士满联邦储备银行行长汤姆-巴金（Tom Barkin）表示，新的通胀数据显示，央行在将通胀率降至2%的目标方面继续取得进展，但利率仍应保持限制性。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Richmond President Tom Barkin said fresh inflation data show the central bank continues to see progress on lowering inflation toward its 2% goal, but that interest rates should remain restrictive.】

item.title: 美国出台新规限制先进芯片流向中国
item.description: 美国公布了新一轮法规，旨在阻止台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：The US unveiled a fresh round of regulations aimed at keeping advanced chips produced by Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. and other producers from making their way to China, one last attempt by the Biden administration to fill holes in the tech blockade of its geopolitical rival.】

item.title: 美国盟友抗议限制获取英伟达芯片的规定
item.description: 波兰和以色列官员抗议美国本周宣布的措施，这些措施将限制他们获得英伟达公司及其同行生产的先进人工智能芯片。【原文：Officials in Poland and Israel protested US measures announced this week that will limit their access to advanced artificial intelligence chips manufactured by Nvidia Corp. and its peers.】

item.title: 维克托-什韦茨谈美国例外论的弊端
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 英国市场缓和后，里夫斯面临信誉考验
item.description: 英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）在本周一系列高风险的公开测试中相对安然无恙。她面临的下一个挑战将是向投资者证明，她有能力支撑其备受打击的经济议程。【原文：Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves has emerged relatively unscathed from a series of high-stakes public tests this week in the UK. Her next challenge will be proving to investors that she can shore up her battered economic agenda.】

item.title: Generali 即将与 Natixis 达成资产管理合资企业协议
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，意大利 Assicurazioni Generali SpA 公司和法国 Natixis SA 公司即将达成一项交易，成立一家资产管理合资企业，以削减成本并在分销方面进行合作。【原文：Assicurazioni Generali SpA and Natixis SA are close to a deal for a joint venture in asset management to cut costs and team up on distribution, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 比利时银行家现在必须发誓诚实行事
item.description: 在比利时努力巩固公众对其金融业的信任之际，数以千计的比利时银行家现在必须承诺在工作中诚实守信。【原文：Thousands of Belgian bankers will now have to promise to be honest on the job as the country tries to shore up public trust in its financial industry.】

item.title: 加拿大房屋销售放缓，买家等待更多降息措施
item.description: 加拿大 12 月份的房屋销售量有所下降，原因是购房者暂缓入市，等待央行进一步降息，因为降息可能会使购房者更容易负担得起。【原文：Canadian home sales dropped in December as buyers took a break from the market to await further interest-rate cuts from the central bank that may make purchases more affordable.】

item.title: 爱尔兰中间派政党为保住政权达成联盟协议
item.description: 爱尔兰的两个主要政党经过数周谈判达成新的联盟协议后，将重新执政五年。【原文：Ireland’s two dominant political parties will return to power for another five-year term after agreeing a new coalition deal following weeks of negotiations.】

item.title: 斯洛文尼亚计划发行欧盟首个与可持续发展挂钩的主权债券
item.description: 斯洛文尼亚财政部负责人表示，斯洛文尼亚的目标是成为第一个发行与可持续性挂钩的债券的欧盟成员国。【原文：Slovenia is aiming to become the first European Union member to issue sustainability-linked bonds, the country’s Treasury chief said.】

item.title: 微软再次尝试让人们使用 ChatGPT 型聊天机器人
item.description:
Microsoft Copilot 将更名为 Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat，这是自 2023 年以来该商务助手的第二次更名。【原文：

Microsoft Copilot is being renamed Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat, the second rebranding of the business-focused assistant since 2023.

】

item.title: 通胀缓解推动美联储降息押注，国债大涨
item.description: 由于美国上月通胀放缓的程度略高于经济学家的预测，一些人对美联储今年将进一步降息的押注重燃，国债反弹。【原文：Treasuries rallied as inflation last month eased in the US by slightly more than economist had predicted, reinvigorating some bets that the Federal Reserve will lower interest rates further this year.】

item.title: 基础设施贷款机构 AFC 着眼于新兴市场证券化
item.description: 非洲金融公司（Africa Finance Corporation）正在研究潜在的合成资产支持证券化，因为这家基础设施贷款机构正努力提高其为从铁路到可再生能源发电厂等项目提供资金的能力。【原文：Africa Finance Corporation is working on a potential synthetic asset-backed securitization, as the infrastructure lender seeks to boost its capacity to fund projects from railways to renewable power plants.】

item.title: 美国核心通胀率六个月来首次下降
item.description: 在持续数月的潜在通胀加快说服美联储发出暂停降息的信号之后，美国 12 月份的消费者物价涨幅低于预期。【原文：US consumer prices rose in December by less than forecast after months of faster underlying inflation persuaded the Federal Reserve to signal a pause in interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 波兰认为特朗普不确定性减弱，推动兹罗提债券上涨
item.description: 波兰预计，随着唐纳德-特朗普重返白宫的不确定性减弱，外国投资者对波兰债券和东欧债务的冷淡情绪将有所改善。【原文：Poland expects the lukewarm foreign-investor sentiment toward its bonds — and eastern European debt in general — to improve as uncertainty surrounding Donald Trump’s return to the White House subsides.】

item.title: 可可下跌，交易商等待磨粉数据提供需求线索
item.description: 可可期货下跌，因为市场正等待分析主要消费地区的第四季度碾磨量数据，以寻找在价格创历史新高的情况下的需求线索。【原文：Cocoa futures fell as the market waits to parse fourth quarter grindings data from key consuming regions for clues on demand in the face of record-high prices.】

item.title: 欧盟要求对芯片、人工智能和量子投资进行风险评估
item.description: 欧盟要求成员国审查其公司在非欧盟国家半导体和人工智能等敏感领域的投资。【原文：The European Union asked member states to review investments by their companies in non-EU countries in sensitive sectors like semiconductors and artificial intelligence.】
